body.name: Stanley Classic Vacuum Insulated Wide Mouth Bottle - BPA-Free 18/8 Stainless Steel Thermos for Cold & Hot Beverages – Keeps Liquid Hot or Cold for Up to 24 Hours

features: KEEP IT HOT OR COLD: Our Stanley Classic Vacuum Bottle is made with superior insulation that keeps liquids (soup, coffee, tea) hot or cold drinks cool for up to 24 hours It’s also made with BPA-free materials, keeping its contents safe to consume

TOUGH AND DURABLE: The rust-proof 18/8 stainless steel construction on this insulated thermos means it can work just as hard as you do without impacting its performance This is an ideal bottle to throw into your truck, work bag or travel with it

MULTI-PURPOSE LID: The Stanley thermos is designed with a leak-resistant lid, so you can put it in your backpack without worrying about any spills The wide mouth of the thermos helps with easy pouring into the lid that doubles as an eight-ounce cup. Thermos material: Stainless steel.

FILL IT FOR THE DAY: Our vacuum bottle comes in multiple sizes – 1 1qt, 1 5qt, and 2qt so you can fill it up with water once and be set for however long you need it The collapsible handle makes it easy to transport with you
body.description: Our Stanley Classic Vacuum Bottle is made with superior insulation that keeps liquids (soup, coffee, tea) hot or cold drinks cool for up to 24 hours. It’s also made with BPA-free materials, keeping its contents safe to consume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Trusty Companion for Hot or Cold Adventures
reviews.reviewText: The Stanley Classic Vacuum Insulated Wide Mouth Bottle has truly earned its place as my go-to thermos for all adventures, and it undeniably deserves a glowing 5-star review. This bottle is the epitome of reliability when it comes to keeping my beverages hot or cold.1. Stellar Insulation: The insulation in this bottle is nothing short of remarkable. Whether I'm craving a steaming cup of coffee on a chilly morning or a refreshing sip of ice-cold water on a scorching day, this bottle delivers. It keeps liquids hot for up to 24 hours and cold for just as long.2. Rugged Durability: The 18/8 stainless steel construction is not only sturdy but also built to withstand the bumps and bruises of outdoor adventures. It's a trusty companion that can handle whatever I throw at it.3. Wide Mouth Convenience: The wide mouth design makes filling, pouring, and cleaning a breeze. It's also versatile enough to accommodate ice cubes, making it perfect for those hot summer days.4. Leak-Proof Assurance: I appreciate the leak-proof lid, which means I can toss this bottle in my bag without worrying about spills. It's a small detail that makes a big difference.5. BPA-Free Peace of Mind: Knowing that this bottle is BPA-free gives me peace of mind. I can enjoy my beverages without any concerns about harmful chemicals leaching into them.6. Iconic Design: The Stanley Classic design is iconic for a reason. It's a timeless look that never goes out of style, whether I'm taking it to the office or on a camping trip.7. Easy to Clean: Cleaning is a breeze thanks to the wide mouth and simple design. It's easy to reach all the nooks and crannies, ensuring a hygienic experience.In conclusion, the Stanley Classic Vacuum Insulated Wide Mouth Bottle is a remarkable thermos that has never let me down. Its exceptional insulation, rugged durability, and user-friendly design make it an essential part of my daily routine and outdoor adventures. Whether you're an outdoor enthusiast, a commuter, or simply someone who values a reliable thermos, this bottle is a must-have. It has earned a solid 5-star rating, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone in need of a dependable way to keep beverages hot or cold. Thank you, Stanley, for creating such a fantastic product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A classic, for good reason.
reviews.reviewText: I use a Keurig coffee maker for the brew quality, but I don't always like having to go across the house to make a cup every time I want one, so I've used all kinds of big travel containers and thermoses over the years. Eventually I decided to ditch the mediocre travel containers and get an actual time-tested Stanley vacuum container. In retrospect, it was a good call.Anyone who's walked through the camping section of a Walmart will doubtlessly recognize this vacuum flask. It's been around seemingly forever (apparently since 1913.) It's a classic, and for good reason. It gets the job done, it does it very well, and it even looks good, bringing to mind the nostalgia of childhood camping trips.This container says it can keep hot drinks hot for 24 hours, and iced drinks cold for 120 hours. I haven't tested this only because I haven't felt the need to. It works better than any of the other travel containers or vacuum flasks I've owned over the past ten years. Your mileage will vary if you use it like I do and are constantly taking the top off throughout the day because opening the container does allow some heat to escape, but that's an inescapable reality of any drink container.The upper-most metal cap is actually a cup, and the containers actual top—or seal—is beneath that cup. The seal itself is a big, thick plug that screws into the mouth of the container. It's made from a hard, quality plastic with a flexible gasket to retain heat and prevent leaks, and it does both very well. I can't imagine this container leaking unless that plug piece actually broke somehow. The container is just barely too big for my car's cup holder so I lay it on my passenger seat on its side, and I've never seen so much as a single drip.The handle feels sturdy and I trust it. I like the way the it folds in and sort of snaps in place against the container to take up less room and prevent jangling around when you don't need to use the handle.I rated this container 5/5 stars for every section, even the "easy to clean" section. Cleaning does require a long "bottle brush" of some sort to clean thoroughly, but that should come as no surprise and these bottle brushes are cheap and easy to find, and they make cleaning exactly as easy as you'd imagine because there are no weird angles or edges inside the container, just a smooth taper that's very easy to scrub.All in all, this Stanley container was a great purchase. It does exactly what you expect it to do without any letdowns. It's built very well and to high quality standards, and is very affordable. You really can't go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Iconic Thermos
reviews.reviewText: This product is exactly as described, well constructed and perfect for what I needed. It consistently maintains the temperature of beverages throughout the day. The handle makes it easy to carry, ot's easy to clean and sanitize, and so convenient that the lid can be used as a cup. Bravo, Stanley!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stanley Stainless Steel Thermos
reviews.reviewText: My husband had one many years ago so I found this one and ordered it for him. He's used it on the cold winter nights and his drink stays warm all night at work. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great as advertised
reviews.reviewText: The stanley thermos keeps coffee hot all day. It's durable and tough so it can stay with me all day! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Stanley Product
reviews.reviewText: Was hoping it was like the old one heavy and solid, This one is a lot lighter and not made like the old ones. I guess if you buy the $45 one it might be ..... But this one kept water warm for 6 hours
I work outside all winter and this thermos does a fantastic job at keeping my tea hot all day. Been outside in -25 all day with this thermos and it was a life saver. Worth the extra price to buy one
Conserva bem a temperatura interna, mas o fundo da garrafa já apresenta um amassado, para um produto que se propõe a ser de alta durabilidade acredito ser uma considerável falha de resistência.
The inner plastic cap starts to melt or disintegrate slowly due to vapour. Should have been made of stainless steel! Else all fine
Die Kanne ist der Hammer, hält ewig heiß. Habe einen Langzeittest gemacht, 98°C heißes Wasser hätte nach 72 Stunden noch 49°C bei Raumtemperatur von 18°C. Der Preis ist ebenfalls unschlagbar günstig.

I love it, stays hot all day, even after you have used water out of it. I get about 5 mugs of tea or coffee out of it. Made very strong, will last for years and years.Have notice when I empty water out that is left in thermos, maybe a cup and 12 hours later, it still has some heat in it. Would highly recomment this item.
